name: Balloon Popper (8BitSquid)
description:
Game will auto save every 30 seconds

Want to turn off sounds? Go to stats and uncheck the box names sounds

All Assests made by me (8bitSquid) besides the following:

Balloon Pop sound by Gniffelbaf on freesound.org

Calm BGM by syncopika on Opengameart.org

Made for Clicker Jam Summer 2022. Click to pop the balloon, with every balloon popped the next one will be stronger. Earn coins to buy new series of balloons.
